name: Stargazer Free
description:
★ ★ ★ Latest Match 3 Puzzle Game from Russia !! ★ ★ ★

★ ★ ★ What's next after Candy ?? The Stars are here ★ ★ ★

Beautiful and interesting puzzle game, a sort of match3. This game develops the power of observation and entertains as well. Connect stars into constellations, destroy clouds and oozes. Help this cute cat with his adventure.

★ More than interesting 300 levels
★ Easy & Fun to play, yet challenging to get ALL Stars
★ Daily Free Spin for awesome Prize
★ Play with your Facebook friends, share gifts and challenge each other.

Facebook : https://www.facebook.com/gzuniverse/
